text:
Hi all,
Can someone tell me if there is a way to use Page Publishing API to create draft pages in Content Staging? My client wants to migrate about 500 WP pages & custom post types to HubSpot, so I was hoping to write an automation tool, but so far my documentation-digging yielded only a possibility of creating a draft page in the primary domain - no way to assign that page to a temporary subdomain, no way to create it directly in content staging ... Is there something I'm missing, or HubSpot just doesn't allow that functionality (hopefully yet?)?

They already have a lot of pages on HubSpot, they just wanted to add the missing ones they have on their old WP site and then scrap it.

Btw. I would be fine with using some hackish, undocumented way, since it's supposed to be just one-off thing, it doesn't matter if it will break in three months :wink:

Thanks a lot!

Hi guys! When I send an attachment to HS via <https://api.hubapi.com/filemanager/api/v3/files/upload>, response is:
```
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
...headers here...

{
    "status": "error",
    "message": "HIGH_RISK_PORTAL",
    "correlationId": "e1399087-14db-4475-9637-5447e514045d"
}```
This happens only in one of my portals
Hi All, I’m having a small issue with a plugin not working after rotating the API key, Does anyone know where to find/confirm the API folderID and campaignID?
Does anybody know if the product endpoint can return or accept payloads for other currencies than the company one?
Everything I see on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/products> doesn’t include anything about currency selection.

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/blogv2/get_blog_posts>
this API is providing topic_ids but not name is there any way to get topic name also in response ??
